altTitles.en: 25 Years of a Woman Reading TV Bros.

description.en:
A collection of short stories that cynically portray regrettable men and women in their 20s and 30s who, despite being old enough to know better, plastered in subculture and bloated with self-consciousness, are unable to discard their dreams.

1. The Chronicle of a Woman Who Sings Bossa Nova Covers of J-Pop Songs Played in Cafes
A woman who has been working towards becoming a musician but has yet to achieve success turns 35, and after engaging in sexual favors, ends up singing a song on a CD of bossa nova covers of J-pop songs produced by an indie label…
2. Downtown Igai no Geinin o Kihon Mitomete Inai Owarai Mania no Rakuen
3. Sora no Shashin to Bump of Chicken no Kashi Bakari Up Suru Blogger no Koi
4. Kuchi no Umai Urekko Writer/Henshuusha ni Shigoto mo Onna mo Zenbu Motte Kareru Manga (MASH UP)
5. carmy's holiday
6. 25 Years of a Woman Reading TV Bros.
